item.title: Added "organization" relationship to the program object.
Added "citizenshipverified" and "residencyverified" boolean fields to the allowed reporter object.
Added endpoint to get all CVE requests for programs. Added endpoint to create a CVE request for programs. Added endpoint to update CVEs for a report.
Added "rulesofengagementsigned", "identityverified" and "background_checked" boolean fields to the allowed reporter object.
Added "state" and "archived_at" fields to the asset object and enabled filtering assets by "state" and "archived" parameters.
Added "inbox_ids" filter field to the Get All Reports endpoint.
Added "submittedat" field to the reports endpoint and enabled filtering by "submittedatgt" and "submitted_atlt" parameters.
Added "cvssvectorstring" field to the severity object.
Enabled filtering assets by ID greater than the specified ID.
Added "oldseverity" and "newseverity" relationships to the activity-report-severity-updated object.
Added aiModel asset type.
Adjusted rate limiting for reports to be more lenient.
Added "lastsignin_at" attribute to the organization member object.
Added endpoint to get all inboxes for organizations. Added inboxes relationship to report. Added endpoint to update inboxes for a report.
Implemented more strict rate limiting for reports
Added collaborators relationship to report.
Added endpoint to get allowed reporters of a private program.
Added endpoint to get activities of allowed reporter of a private program.

Deprecated "Get whitelisted reporters of a private program" endpoint and get activities of whitelisted reporter of a private program endpoints. Use get allowed reporters of a private program and get activities of allowed reporter of a private program instead.
Added sorting by reportid, createdat, updated_at fields on query activities endpoint.
Added endpoint to get whitelisted reporters of a private program.
Added endpoint to get activities of whitelisted reporter of a private program.
Added the attribute email to organization-member object.
Added endpoint to get all programs for organizations.
Added endpoint to get all eligibility settings in an organization.
Added endpoint to get an eligibility settings in an organization.
Added endpoint to create a group for an organizations.
Added endpoint to get a member in an organization.
Added endpoint to update a group from an organizations.
Added endpoint to get a group in an organization.
Added endpoint to list pending invitations in an organization.
Added endpoint to update a member for an organizations.
Added endpoint to delete a member for an organizations.
Added error 422 to error responses.
Added endpoint to create an invitation to an organizations.
Added endpoint to get all groups for organizations.
Added endpoint to get all members for organizations.
Added endpoint to add an asset to scope for assets.
Added endpoint to add an archive asset scopes for assets.
Added endpoint to update an asset for assets.
Added endpoint to archive assets for assets.
Updated valid key parameter values for analytics.
Added endpoint to get analytics data for analytics.
Added endpoint to get your organizations for organizations.
Added endpoint to create an asset for assets.
Added endpoint to get all assets for assets.
Added endpoint to get an asset for assets.
Added endpoint to get all asset tags for assets.
Added endpoint to retrieve an assets import for assets.
Added endpoint to import assets with CSV file for assets.
Added endpoint to upload attachments for state changes.
Added endpoint to upload attachments for comments.
Added automated and custom remediation guidance attributes to the report object.
Added rate limits for read and write operations to ensure platform stability.
Added endpoint to request a retest for a report.
Added endpoint to get an activity by ID.
Added report attributes that track how long it took to respond, triage, reward, and resolve a report. Additionally, the report object now also contains when it expects any of those actions to happen.
Added endpoint to add report participants.
Added endpoint to transfer reports between related programs
Added program management permission requirement to the get awarded swag endpoint.
Added endpoint to upload attachments to program policy.
Enabled filtering reports by hacker disclosure request. Added attribute to report for timestamp when the reporter agreed for disclosure.
Added groups attribute to member object.
Added endpoint for redacting reports.
Added endpoint for cancelling the report disclosure request.
Added attribute for requesting report disclosure to show the disclosure timestamp.
Added endpoint for requesting report disclosure.
Added endpoint for showing program policy and its attachments.
Added endpoint for fetching bounty suggestions.
Added endpoint to fetch all program swag.
Added endpoint for filtering reports by keywords.
Enabled filtering reports by severities.
Added endpoint for updating report structured scope.
Added endpoint for getting program's balance.
Added endpoint for fetching program payment transactions.
Added endpoint for fetching program thanks items.
Enabled filtering reports by weaknesses.
Added endpoint for marking swag as sent.
Made title, vulnerability information, impact, and source parameters required for the report create endpoint.
Added endpoint to mark a report as ineligible for bounty.
Added endpoint for updating program policy.
Added endpoint for updating report weakness.
Added endpoint to create reports.
Added endpoint for fetching program weaknesses.
Added a severity parameter to create a program bounty, it will set the severity for the created report.
Made the recipient parameter optional to create a program bounty and added the claim link to the response.
Added filter attribute to include/exclude hacker published reports.
Added endpoint to read Audit Log for a Program.
Expose Custom Field Attributes on a Program and added endpoint for updating Custom Field Values on a Report.
Added endpoint for creating/updating severities on reports.
Enabled filtering reports by assignee emails.
Added endpoints for fetching, creating, updating, and archiving structured scopes.
Added activities endpoint.
Enabled filtering reports by assignees.
Added attribute to report to show CVE IDs.
Added endpoint for fetching specific data of a user.
added endpoint for fetching common responses of a program.
added endpoints for awarding bounties, suggesting bounties, and for awarding swag.

added lastpublicactivity_at in favor of lastactivityat. The new attribute can be used in filtering and exposes the date of the last public activity. The lastactivityat attribute will now return the date of the last activity, both public and internal.
added endpoint to disable commenting / locking a report.
added the reports resource that enables the user to update the title of reports that are received by teams the API user is part of.
added the me resource that enables the user to query the programs the API user is part of.
added ability to filter reports based on user usernames. Added endpoint to retrieve a list of users that participated in a program.
added ability to set a page size when querying reports.
added ability to change the state of a report object and added ability to post internal and public comments.
added severity relationship to report object.
added endpoint to query more information about a program.
added ability to assign users and groups to a report.
added reputation, signal, and impact metrics of a report's reporter.
removed inlining if a report in the bug cloned activity to avoid a denial of service vulnerability when the original report references the cloned report.
fixed a bug where the time in a date filter was erroneously truncated.
added activity objects for hacker mediation requests and vulnerability types updates.
the endpoint for querying reports now returns descriptive errors in case an invalid filter value is given.
added lastactivityat attribute to the report object and as a filter for querying reports.
removed inlined duplicate report object from activities relationship when a single report is fetched.
introduced endpoint to query multiple reports.
introduced endpoint to query a single report.
